llm_command:
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: recommendationservice
  namespace: recommendationservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: recommendationservice
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: productcatalogservice
EOF
